name: Yet Another Door
description:
You're participating in a social experiment. Your goal is to do what you're told to do, and in the end there will be a reward.

Pay attention, there's more to this place than it seems...

Experimental first-person procedurally-generated exploration game with cozy old-school 3D graphics and plenty of secrets to find.

Game features-

-2 alternative endings-

-engaging puzzles-

-about 3 hours of (somewhat) diverse gameplay-

-and-

-simplistic yet complicated plot...

...now go figure that out. But if you play the game you'll understand what i mean!

The game on:

Indie Game Magazine

http://indiegamemag.com/yet-another-door-challenges-players-self-reliance

Alpha Beta Gamer

http://www.alphabetagamer.com/yet-another-door-gam...

In the demo version the game is finished 40%~45% so feel free to check it out first!

longwintershadows.com
